about_the_game:
The Mega City Force Original Soundtrack is a collection of 12 original tracks by G.E. Wolf, Mangiemoose. Dive into the synth-wave music of Mega City to feel the power you need to fight crime.
Please note that this soundtrack includes only original tracks and does not feature artists such as Droid Bishop, Timecop1983, sublunar, Nightcrawler, Occams Laser, and Midsummer Ex. You can discover their music in the game and on their official music platforms.

All tracks are in MP3 format

name: Mega City Force Soundtrack
short_description: Retrowave Skill-Based Action Roguelike about tough cops fighting crime and keeping peace the old-fashioned way. Choose your cop and dive into hardcore action against enemies and bosses using a huge arsenal and special abilities that will define your playstyle. The law will make crime bleed.
